short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your links safe and secure with this Locker. No one can access your links without your password.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This locker is for the user who are concerned with privacy. User can keep their work and links hidden. One can keep their links stored with some pass-key. That pass key is only known to user. Only with that key user can access their hidden links. If User stored multiple links he/she can use filter provided by developer to find out perticular one. The extension found very useful in terms of privacy, security and safe browsing.
